task.title: Task
task.closeAndStart: Close task and start a new one
task.delete: Delete Task (Shift + Click to skip confirmation)

about: Generate, refactor, and debug code with AI assistance. Check out our <DocsLink>documentation</DocsLink> to learn more.
onboarding: Your task list in this workspace is empty.

boomerangTasks.title: Boomerang Tasks
boomerangTasks.description: Split tasks into smaller, manageable parts

stickyModels.title: Sticky Models
stickyModels.description: Each mode remembers your last used model

tools.title: Tools
tools.description: Allow the AI to solve problems by browsing the web, running commands, and more

customizableModes.title: Customizable Modes
customizableModes.description: Specialized personas with their own behaviors and assigned models

enhancePromptDescription: The 'Enhance Prompt' button helps improve your prompt by providing additional context, clarification, or rephrasing. Try typing a prompt in here and clicking the button again to see how it works.
addContext: @ to add context, / to switch modes
dragFiles: hold shift to drag in files
dragFilesImages: hold shift to drag in files/images

checkpoint.initializingWarning: Still initializing checkpoint... If this takes too long, you can disable checkpoints in <settingsLink>settings</settingsLink> and restart your task.

menu.restoreFilesDescription: Restores your project's files back to a snapshot taken at this point.
menu.restoreFilesAndTaskDescription: Restores your project's files back to a snapshot taken at this point and deletes all messages after this point.

instructions.wantsToFetch: ModelHarbor wants to fetch detailed instructions to assist with the current task

fileOperations.wantsToRead: ModelHarbor wants to read this file:
fileOperations.wantsToReadMultiple: ModelHarbor wants to read multiple files:
fileOperations.wantsToReadAndXMore: ModelHarbor wants to read this file and {{count}} more:
fileOperations.wantsToReadOutsideWorkspace: ModelHarbor wants to read this file outside of the workspace:
fileOperations.wantsToEdit: ModelHarbor wants to edit this file:
fileOperations.wantsToEditOutsideWorkspace: ModelHarbor wants to edit this file outside of the workspace:
fileOperations.wantsToCreate: ModelHarbor wants to create a new file:
fileOperations.wantsToSearchReplace: ModelHarbor wants to search and replace in this file:
fileOperations.didSearchReplace: ModelHarbor performed search and replace on this file:
fileOperations.wantsToInsert: ModelHarbor wants to insert content into this file:
fileOperations.wantsToInsertWithLineNumber: ModelHarbor wants to insert content into this file at line {{lineNumber}}:
fileOperations.wantsToInsertAtEnd: ModelHarbor wants to append content to the end of this file:

directoryOperations.wantsToViewTopLevel: ModelHarbor wants to view the top level files in this directory:
directoryOperations.didViewTopLevel: ModelHarbor viewed the top level files in this directory:
directoryOperations.wantsToViewRecursive: ModelHarbor wants to recursively view all files in this directory:
directoryOperations.didViewRecursive: ModelHarbor recursively viewed all files in this directory:
directoryOperations.wantsToViewDefinitions: ModelHarbor wants to view source code definition names used in this directory:
directoryOperations.didViewDefinitions: ModelHarbor viewed source code definition names used in this directory:
directoryOperations.wantsToSearch: ModelHarbor wants to search this directory for {{regex}}:

codebaseSearch.wantsToSearch: ModelHarbor wants to search the codebase for {{query}}:
codebaseSearch.wantsToSearchWithPath: ModelHarbor wants to search the codebase for {{query}} in {{path}}:

mcp.wantsToUseTool: ModelHarbor wants to use a tool on the {{serverName}} MCP server:
mcp.wantsToAccessResource: ModelHarbor wants to access a resource on the {{serverName}} MCP server:

modes.wantsToSwitch: ModelHarbor wants to switch to {{mode}} mode
modes.wantsToSwitchWithReason: ModelHarbor wants to switch to {{mode}} mode because: {{reason}}

subtasks.wantsToCreate: ModelHarbor wants to create a new subtask in {{mode}} mode:
subtasks.wantsToFinish: ModelHarbor wants to finish this subtask
subtasks.defaultResult: Please continue to the next task.
subtasks.completionInstructions: Subtask completed! You can review the results and suggest any corrections or next steps. If everything looks good, confirm to return the result to the parent task.

powershell.issues: It seems like you're having Windows PowerShell issues, please see this

autoApprove.title: Auto-approve:
autoApprove.description: Auto-approve allows ModelHarbor Agent to perform actions without asking for permission. Only enable for actions you fully trust. More detailed configuration available in <settingsLink>Settings</settingsLink>.

followUpSuggest.copyToInput: Copy to input (same as shift + click)

browser.rooWantsToUse: ModelHarbor wants to use the browser:

systemPromptWarning: WARNING: Custom system prompt override active. This can severely break functionality and cause unpredictable behavior.
profileViolationWarning: The current profile violates your organization's settings

shellIntegration.title: Command Execution Warning
shellIntegration.description: Your command is being executed without VSCode terminal shell integration. To suppress this warning you can disable shell integration in the Terminal section of the ModelHarbor Agent settings or troubleshoot VSCode terminal integration using the link below.
shellIntegration.troubleshooting: Click here for shell integration documentation.

autoApprovedRequestLimitReached.title: Auto-Approved Request Limit Reached
autoApprovedRequestLimitReached.description: ModelHarbor has reached the auto-approved limit of {{count}} API request(s). Would you like to reset the count and proceed with the task?
